Class OrmPreconditions

extends java.lang.Object

    Utility class used to check method preconditions.

      • checkForTransaction

        public static void checkForTransaction(boolean autocommit,
                       boolean txOpen)
        Verifies that if autocommit is disabled, a transaction is open.
        Parameters:
        autocommit - indicates if autocommit is enabled or disabled
        txOpen - indicates if there is a transaction open or not

      • checkPersistenceForModify

        public static void checkPersistenceForModify(java.lang.Object model,
                             PersistencePolicy policy)
        Verifies that the given model is persistent and can be saved, updated, or deleted.
        Parameters:
        model - model to check persistence for
        policy - PersistencePolicy to use

        Verifies that the given model Class is persistent and can be loaded.
        Parameters:

        policy - PersistencePolicy to use
